messages.text: I’ve been looking at Ferrite.jl as an option for simulating a 2D beam with material nonlinearities (hyperelasticity) and subjected to large deformations. I was wondering if it would be simple to have 2 materials/constitutive models, for example one frame of a certain hyperelastic material and an inner part having different marerial/constitutive model.
